<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd"> <mapper namespace="${packageName}.security.dao.OrgPOMapper"> <resultMap id="BaseResultMap" type="${packageName}.security.entity.HotpotOrganizationPO"> <id column="id" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="id" /> <result column="org_full_id" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="orgFullId" /> <result column="org_name" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="orgName" /> <result column="org_full_name" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="orgFullName" /> <result column="parent_id" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="parentId" /> <result column="description" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="description" /> <result column="created_at" jdbcType="TIMESTAMP" property="createdAt" /> <result column="updated_at" jdbcType="TIMESTAMP" property="updatedAt" /> <result column="created_by" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="createdBy" /> <result column="updated_by" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="updatedBy" /> <result column="del_flag" jdbcType="VARCHAR" property="delFlag" /> <result column="sort" jdbcType="INTEGER" property="sort" /> </resultMap>
<sql id="Base_Column_List"> id, org_full_id, org_name, org_full_name, parent_id, description, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by, del_flag, sort </sql>
<select id="selectAllOrg" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from hotpot_organization where del_flag = '0' order by sort </select>
<select id="searchOrg" parameterType="${packageName}.security.entity.HotpotOrganizationPO" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from hotpot_organization where del_flag = '0' <if test="id != null and id != ''"> and org_full_id like CONCAT('%',${r'#'}{id},'%') </if> </select>
<insert id="saveOrg" parameterType="${packageName}.security.entity.HotpotOrganizationPO"> insert into hotpot_organization (id, org_full_id, org_name, org_full_name, parent_id, description, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by, del_flag, sort ) values (${r'#'}{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{orgFullId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{orgFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ${r'#'}{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ${r'#'}{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ${r'#'}{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) </insert>
<update id="updateOrg" parameterType="${packageName}.security.entity.HotpotOrganizationPO"> update hotpot_organization <set> <if test="orgFullId != null"> org_full_id = ${r'#'}{orgFullId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="orgName != null"> org_name = ${r'#'}{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="orgFullName != null"> org_full_name = ${r'#'}{orgFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="parentId != null"> parent_id = ${r'#'}{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="description != null"> description = ${r'#'}{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="createdAt != null"> created_at = ${r'#'}{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, </if> <if test="updatedAt != null"> updated_at = ${r'#'}{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, </if> <if test="createdBy != null"> created_by = ${r'#'}{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="updatedBy != null"> updated_by = ${r'#'}{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="delFlag != null"> del_flag = ${r'#'}{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, </if> <if test="sort != null"> sort = ${r'#'}{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, </if> </set> where id = ${r'#'}{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} </update>
<delete id="deleteOrg" parameterType="java.lang.String"> delete from hotpot_organization where id = ${r'#'}{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} </delete>
<select id="selectOrgUser" parameterType="java.lang.String" resultType="${packageName}.security.entity.HotpotUserPO"> select id as id, user_name as userName, name as name, org_id as orgId, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, del_flag as delFlag from hotpot_user where org_id = ${r'#'}{orgId} </select> </mapper>
